div.p: For those who like to do more than just code, we're pleased to announce Ski PHP 2015, which will be held from May 7-9, 2015, in conjunction with the OpenWest Conference. Attendees will be able to enjoy the skiing, snowboarding, snowmobiling, and other outdoor activities that Utah has to offer after the conclusion of the conference.

We are looking for presentations on a variety of topics, including frameworks, security, front-end, and data. Interested presenters should submit to our CFP at http://cfp.openwest.org/. A generous speaker package will be provided for accepted speakers.
